docs.title: Emoji Test
docs.text: I like to drink after I played

docs.title: LUKS Fido2
docs.text: On this page I will explain, how to decrypt LUKS encrypted partition

docs.title: Voraussetzungen:
docs.text:
• Debian 13 setup with encryption
  • Hardware fido2 Token (e.g.: yubikey, Token2)

docs.title: An example of codeblock in python
docs.text:
Add numbers.py
# Function to add two numbers
def add_two_numbers(num1, num2):
    return num1 + num2

# Example usage
result = add_two_numbers(5, 3)
print('The sum is:', result)
